name: BROWSER__RUN_BROWSER_AUTOMATION
description: Runs AI-powered browser automation using browser-use with Steel browser session. Can perform complex web tasks, extract data, fill forms, navigate sites, and interact with web elements intelligently.

task.description: Detailed task description for the AI agent including specific steps, expected outcomes, and any data to extract or actions to perform. Be specific about websites to visit, forms to fill, buttons to click, data to collect, and success criteria. Example: 'Navigate to https://example.com, search for 'AI tools', click on the first result, extract the pricing information from the page, and summarize the key features.'

name: BROWSER__SCRAPE_WITH_BROWSER
description: Scrapes website content using advanced crawl4ai library with Steel browser via CDP connection. Returns clean markdown content from any webpage with stealth capabilities, proxy support, and anti-detection features. Optionally supports LLM-based extraction with custom instructions using GPT-OSS model for structured data extraction.

url.description: The complete URL of the website to scrape. Must include protocol (http:// or https://). Example: 'https://example.com/page' or 'https://news.site.com/article/123'

extraction_instructions.description: Optional LLM extraction instructions. If provided, uses GPT-OSS model to extract structured data according to your specific requirements. Example: 'Extract all product names and prices as a JSON array' or 'Summarize the main points of this article in bullet format' or 'Extract contact information including emails and phone numbers'
